hero.title: FIGHTING FOR RIGHTS
hero.description: Since 2007, the Urban Quilombola Community Association João Borges Vieira has been working to guarantee housing, education, culture and dignity for more than 700 quilombola families in the region.

image.alt: Photo of the João Borges Vieira Quilombola Community Association

cards.text: The association has been fundamental in achieving decent housing for the community.
Preserving and promoting cultural traditions, the association organizes activities such as drum dancing.
The association provides support to vulnerable families, facilitating access to social programs.
